Pre-Game Insights: The Hornets are without their top centers, leaving the paint vulnerable to Duren.
Duren has been dominant against the Hornets with higher points and rebounds.
The Pistons are allowing the 5th most points to centers, which Duren can exploit.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is at the Spectrum Center in Charlotte.
The Pistons have a 19-18 record, while the Hornets are 8-27.
